verses.roman:
gopīnātha paṭṭanāyaka--rāmānanda-bhrātā
rājā māritechila, prabhu haila trātā

synonyms: gopīnātha paṭṭanāyaka—of the name Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka; rāmānanda-bhrātā—the brother of Śrī Rāmānanda Rāya; rājā—the King; māritechila—condemned to death; prabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; haila—became; trātā—the deliverer.
translation: After this, Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu saved Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka, the younger brother of Rāmānanda Rāya, from being condemned to death by the King.
